android.health.pedometer
Class ExcerciseSessionInfo

java.lang.Object
  android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSessionInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener
public class ExcerciseSessionInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener

This class stores the core information about the exercise itself from the exercise session: estimated distance, time taken, method taken to estimate distance, average estimated speed, max estimated speed, minimum estimated speed, etc.

Author:
Joel Botner

Constructor Summary
ExcerciseSessionInfo(int travelType, DistanceChecker checker)
          This creates a new ExcerciseSessionInfo to store the important details about the specified means of exercise.
 
Method Summary
 int getDistance()
          Returns the current tallied distance traveled as estimated by the DistanceChecker.
 int getTravel()
          Returns the type of travel the user indicated they were using for this exercise session.
 void onMonitoringEnd(int finalDistance)
          This method is called when the user ends the Exercise Session, this has the same effect as updateDistance(), but is only called when monitoring is shut down.
 void updateDistance(int distance)
          This method simply updates the listener that the current distance traveled has changed.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

ExcerciseSessionInfo

public ExcerciseSessionInfo(int travelType,
                            DistanceChecker checker)
This creates a new ExcerciseSessionInfo to store the important details about the specified means of exercise. After creation, it will begin to poll the DistanceChecker for updated distance counts until the session ends.

Parameters:
travelType - - The type of exercise the user is doing: 1 for walking, 2 for running, and 3 for biking
checker - - The specific DistanceChecker to obtain distance counts from.
Method Detail

getTravel

public int getTravel()
Returns the type of travel the user indicated they were using for this exercise session.

Returns:
1 for walking, 2 for running, and 3 for biking

getDistance

public int getDistance()
Returns the current tallied distance traveled as estimated by the DistanceChecker.

Returns:
The current distance traveled in hundredths of a mile.

onMonitoringEnd

public void onMonitoringEnd(int finalDistance)
Description copied from interface: DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener
This method is called when the user ends the Exercise Session, this has the same effect as updateDistance(), but is only called when monitoring is shut down.

Specified by:
onMonitoringEnd in interface DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener
Parameters:
finalDistance - - The final estimated distance covered as registered by the sensors.

updateDistance

public void updateDistance(int distance)
Description copied from interface: DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener
This method simply updates the listener that the current distance traveled has changed.

Specified by:
updateDistance in interface DistanceChecker.DistanceCheckerListener
Parameters:
distance - - New distance traveled estimate.
